translations.translation: when the Messengers' time is appointed -
And when the time comes for raising the little girls (buried alive) --
and the appointed time to bring the Messengers together arrives, (then shall the promised event come to pass).
The Messengers will receive their appointments.
And when the time of the Noble Messengers arrives.
And when the Messengers are Uqqitat.
And when the apostles are gathered at their appointed time
and when the Messengers' time is set,
And when the messengers are brought unto their time appointed -
and when the messengers are brought together at the appointed time --
And when the apostles are collected at the appointed time,
and time is set for the apostles [to bear witness]
And when the messengers are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-
And when the Messengers are gathered to their time appointed;
and when the Messengers' time is set
And when the messengers' time has come...
[77:11] and when the time is set for the [testimony of the] messengers (read uqqitat or wuqqitat), that is to say, [when] they are gathered to an appointed time,
718 And when the messengers are brought unto their time appointed) and when the messengers are gathered.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ } معناه أُجلتْ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ } المبعوثون؛ للإرشاد والتكميل، والإشهاد على صلاح العباد وسدادهم { أُقِّتَتْ } [المرسلات: 11] ووُقِّتَت؛ أي: غُيِّن لهم وقت الشهادة على أممهم بعدما أبهم عليهم وقتها في النشأة الأولى




كأنه قيل لهم من قِبَل الحق: { لأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ } [المرسلات: 12] وأُخرت شهادتهم؟
